name: Face with Thermometer
baseMeaning: A yellow face with a thermometer in its mouth, appearing ill with flushed cheeks.
tldr: Sick, feeling unwell, or calling in sick.

contextMeanings.meaning: Having a fever or being physically ill.
Pretending to be sick to avoid something.

platformNotes.note: Used when sharing about being sick.
Common in stories about sick days.
Often in relatable sick day content.

generationalNotes.note: Used both genuinely and ironically for avoiding things.
Standard sick emoji for work excuses.

seoTitle: Face with Thermometer Emoji Meaning - What Does  Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the face with thermometer emoji  really means. From genuine illness to calling in sick, discover all its uses.
